sections.text: Perishable property; cropsUpon the petition of the succession representative as provided in Articles 3263 and 3271, the court may order the immediate sale of perishable property and growing crops either at public auction or private sale, without appraisal, and without advertisement, or with such advertisement as the court may direct.
